properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 10 at 7:47PM MST until February 10 at 10:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix AZ
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a

* Flood Advisory for...
Western La Paz County in west central Arizona...

* Until 1045 PM MST.

* At 745 PM MST, local law enforcement reported minor flooding along
State Route 95 between Mileposts 115 and 117 north of Quartzsite
due to heavy rain that fell over the past few hours in the
upstream basin. Up to three quarters of an inch has already fallen.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Quartzsite.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.

A Flood Advisory means river or stream flows are elevated, or ponding
of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
